author: Dominion DMS
title: BOCA RATON, Fla. , Oct. 17, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- D
text:
BOCA RATON, Fla. , Oct. 17, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Dominion DMS announces the launch of a new cloud native solution for U.S. automobile dealers. Adding to their VUE DMS portfolio, VUE Net provides dealers a next generation level of business continuity, one designed explicitly for the automotive industry and dealership operations. Given the escalating concerns of cybersecurity and compliance across the industry, the timing could not be better.
VUE Net equips dealers with an immediate recovery strategy, ensuring they can swiftly rebound from disruptions, attacks, or disasters. It reduces downtime and financial losses. In addition, it mitigates potential damage to customer trust, service loyalty and long-term brand reputation. VUE Net does not discriminate; it can backup and restore any major DMS provider in a matter of hours.
Key features of VUE Net's Business Continuity Plan are:
Data extraction and backup process in a true cloud native environment Plan and documentation for emergency situations Rollover training for your dealership team VUE DMS Core functionality OEM integrations Third Party Integrations Critical availability of data (Active:Active configuration across multiple regions) 24/7 monitoring by Microsoft Security Team Cyber attacks, system failures, and natural disasters are inevitable. In 2023, the automotive sector experienced 295 cybersecurity incidents — that's 20% of all automotive cybersecurity incidents over a 13-year period. That number doesn't even address all the 2024 occurrences. VUE Net aims to equip automotive dealers with a solution that ensures uninterrupted business operations while eliminating manual processes.
"Our goal in bringing this solution to dealers is to help them have a TRUE redundancy plan in place; one with rapid rollover capabilities, so they can focus on their business and not worry about system availability. VUE Net helps dealers mitigate the impact of disaster and have a safety net in place… just in case." - Sharon Kitzman , President , Dominion DMS.
Leverage a DMS with a Better VUE For more information on availability or pricing, visit dominiondms.com/vue-net.
About Dominion DMS : VUE by Dominion DMS is a Cloud - Core dealer management system that provides US-based franchised automotive dealers the freedom, foundation, client experience, client engagement & support to meet today's rapidly changing market. VUE enables dealers to deliver seamless customer interactions, reduce costs and protect their business with enhanced security. In addition, VUE DMS provides technology partners with access and integration through certified SecureVUE APIs. This helps dealers build their best Tech Stack.
For more information, visit our website , and like us on Facebook , LinkedIn , and YouTube .
MEDIA RELATIONS: Scott Smith Product & Content Marketing Manager Dominion DMS [email protected]
SOURCE Dominion DMS

author: Caracol Cartagena"/>
title: Procuraduría formuló pliego de cargos en contra de un inspector de policía de Cartagena
text:
Cartagena
La Procuraduría General de la Nación abrió investigación contra Arnaldo Hidalgo Hurtado en su calidad inspector de policía rural de Bayunca, Cartagena de Indias , por presunta omisión injustificada en el cumplimiento de sus deberes al no resolver recurso de reposición interpuesto dentro del proceso policivo de Lizandro León Calderín contra Joaquín Elías Morales Majul, Luis Felipe Morales Carmona y Personas Indeterminadas, recurso presentado en contra de la decisión que negó declarar la nulidad de la actuación.
Ingresa al grupo de alertas de Caracol Radio Cartagena
El pasado 7 de junio de 2022 el ente de control tuvo conocimiento, a través de la queja interpuesta por el ciudadano César Fernando Amaya Rodríguez , que en un proceso policivo por perturbación a la posesión promovido por el señor Lisandro León Calderín ante la Inspección de Policía del Corregimiento de Punta Canoa, se cometieron una serie de irregularidades afectaron el debido proceso.
El Ministerio Público encontró que el 8 de febrero de 2021 el disciplinado, Arnaldo Hidalgo Hurtado, recibió el expediente policivo tras declarase impedido el inspector de Policía de Punta Canoa, Luis Carlos López Posso , reanudando su trámite, y avocando conocimiento.
Desde el 30 de enero de 2020 el señor César Fernando Amaya Rodríguez solicitó la nulidad de todo lo actuado por violación al debido proceso, puesto que la sociedad que representaba no fue vinculada, ni notificada de la querella interpuesta, vulnerado así su ejercicio del derecho a la defensa .
Lea también: A la cárcel presuntos integrantes de la banda ‘Los Cerezos’ por extorsión en Cartagena
El 19 de agosto de 2021 Hidalgo negó las nulidades solicitadas por el quejoso, y en consecuencia interpuso un recurso de reposición , el cual nunca fue resuelto por el inspector a cargo .

author: Cindee Newell
title: 15 Best 128GB RAM For 2023 | Robots.net
text: Are you on the hunt for the best 128GB RAM for 2023? Look no further! In this article, we have rounded up the 15 top choices that are sure to elevate your computer's performance to new heights. Whether you are a professional gamer, a video editor, or a hardcore multitasker, having ample RAM is crucial for a smooth and seamless computing experience. With a whopping 128GB of RAM, these options offer lightning-fast speeds, incredible multitasking capabilities, and enhanced overall efficiency. Get ready to take your computer's performance to the next level with our comprehensive guide to the 15 best 128GB RAM for 2023. Overall Score: 9/10 The Corsair VENGEANCE RGB PRO 128GB DDR4 memory is a high-performance desktop memory that offers vivid, animated lighting with its ten ultra-bright, individually addressable RGB LEDs per module. It can be easily customized and controlled using the CORSAIR iCUE software, allowing you to synchronize lighting across all your compatible products. This memory is compatible with both Intel and AMD DDR4 motherboards and requires no extra wires or cables for installation. It also features a custom performance PCB for optimal signal quality, carefully screened ICs for extended overclocking potential, and an aluminum heat spreader for excellent memory cooling. With Intel XMP 2.0 support and a limited lifetime warranty, the Corsair VENGEANCE RGB PRO 128GB DDR4 memory provides a reliable and visually stunning solution for your desktop needs. Key Features - High performance DDR4 memory with vivid RGB lighting - CORSAIR i CUE software for customization and synchronization - Compatible with Intel and AMD DDR4 motherboards - Easy installation with no extra wires or cables - Custom performance PCB and screened ICs for overclocking potential - Aluminum heat spreader for superior memory cooling - Supports Intel XMP 2.0 for simple one-setting installation - Limited lifetime warranty for peace of mind Specifications - Color: Black - Dimension: 5.44Lx0.30Wx2.00H - Size: 128GB (4x32GB) Pros - Individual temperature warning sensors per stick - Excellent for multi-monitor video editing - Perfect for RAM-intensive tasks like video editing and composing - Reliable and compatible with various motherboards - Fast delivery and easy installation Cons - Forced to pay for RGB if not desired - Some users experienced defective units - Latency on these sticks is a bit high The Corsair VENGEANCE RGB PRO 128GB DDR4 memory is an impressive solution for those in need of high-performance and visually appealing desktop memory. With its individually addressable RGB LEDs and customizable lighting profiles, this memory adds a vibrant touch to any system. It offers excellent compatibility with both Intel and AMD DDR4 motherboards, and the included CORSAIR iCUE software allows for easy synchronization with other compatible products. Along with its reliable performance, the memory features temperature warning sensors, extended overclocking potential, and a limited lifetime warranty for peace of mind. While the RGB lighting may not appeal to everyone, the Corsair VENGEANCE RGB PRO 128GB DDR4 memory is a solid choice for those seeking a powerful and visually striking memory upgrade. With a low-profile height and solid aluminum heatspreader, it fits perfectly in most small-form-factor builds while efficiently dissipating heat. The memory chips are hand-sorted for optimal overclocking performance and are compatible with the latest Intel and AMD DDR4 motherboards. The Corsair Vengeance LPX also supports Intel XMP 2.0 for easy installation and setup. This 128GB (4x32GB) DDR4 2666 memory kit comes in a sleek black color and is a great choice for gamers looking to boost their system's performance. With its hand-sorted memory chips, low-profile design, and efficient heat dissipation, this memory kit provides optimal overclocking capabilities and ensures smooth gameplay. The compatibility with Intel and AMD motherboards, along with the easy installation using Intel XMP 2.0, makes it a hassle-free upgrade option. Whether you’re a serious gamer or a multitasker, the Corsair Vengeance LPX delivers the speed and reliability you need. Upgrade your gaming battles with this powerful memory kit. It features a 128GB kit containing 4 x 32GB modules, with a speed of DDR4-2666 and CAS Latency CL18 (18-18-18-38) at 1.20V. This RAM is ideal for gamers and users dealing with [big data](https://robots.net/fintech/how-big-is-big-data/), offering reliability, durability, and performance. It supports XMP profile to reach overclock speed and is compatible with various motherboards. However, it is important not to mix memory kits to avoid stability issues or system failure. With positive reviews praising its compatibility and performance, this G.SKILL RAM is a great choice for high-performance gaming and computing needs. Key Features - Designed for AMD and Intel platforms - 128GB kit with 4 x 32GB modules - DDR4-2666 speed with CL18 latency at 1.20V - XMP profile support for overclocking - Compatible with validated motherboards Specifications - Color: Black - Size: 128GB Pros - Great compatibility with AMD and Intel platforms - Reliable and durable performance - Good value for the price Cons - Possible stability issues when mixing memory kits - Some reports of defective sticks and lack of tech support The G.SKILL Ripjaws V Series DDR4 RAM provides excellent performance, reliability, and compatibility for gaming and high-performance computing. With a 128GB kit and support for overclocking, it offers the necessary power for handling demanding tasks and big data. Users have praised its compatibility with both AMD and Intel platforms, making it a versatile choice. However, there have been reports of stability issues when mixing memory kits, and some users have experienced defective sticks without proper tech support. Overall, if you’re looking for a high-performance RAM kit at a reasonable price, the G.SKILL Ripjaws V Series is a solid option. It is optimized for compatibility with the latest Intel and AMD DDR4 motherboards and features a low-profile design that fits in most small-form-factor builds. The solid aluminum heatspreader efficiently dissipates heat to maintain high clock speeds. The memory supports Intel XMP 2.0 for easy installation and setup. Available in black, it can match the style of any system. With a customer rating of 4.8/5, this memory is a reliable and affordable choice for users seeking improved speed and capacity. Key Features - Hand-sorted memory chips for high performance - Wide compatibility with Intel and AMD DDR4 motherboards - Low-profile height of 34mm for small-form-factor builds - Efficient heat dissipation with solid aluminum heatspreader - Supports Intel XMP 2.0 for easy installation and setup - Available in multiple colors to match system style Specifications - Color: Black - Dimension: 5.31Lx0.28Wx1.32H - Size: 128GB Kit (4x32GB) Pros - Hand-sorted memory chips ensure high performance - Low-profile design fits in small-form-factor builds - Efficient heat dissipation for consistent clock speeds - Wide compatibility with Intel and AMD motherboards - Easy one-setting installation with Intel XMP 2.0 - Affordable price compared to other RAM kits at this speed Cons - Some users experienced difficulty in initial setup - Limited overclocking capability for certain motherboards The Corsair Vengeance LPX DDR4 3200 Desktop Memory offers a reliable and affordable solution for users looking to upgrade their system’s speed and capacity. With hand-sorted memory chips, wide compatibility, and efficient heat dissipation, this memory delivers high performance and stability. Its low-profile design and multiple color options make it suitable for various system builds. While some users experienced initial setup difficulties and limited overclocking capability with certain motherboards, the overall positive feedback and customer rating of 4.8/5 indicate that this memory provides a significant improvement in system performance. Whether for gaming or intensive tasks, the Corsair Vengeance LPX DDR4 3200 Desktop Memory is a worthwhile investment. Overall Score: 8/10 The Lenovo Legion Tower 5 Gaming Desktop is a high-performance computer designed for gamers who want impressive gameplay. It features an i9-11900K processor for faster speed and better aim. The Legion Coldfront 2.0 cooling system ensures optimal performance by maintaining proper thermals. With NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 graphics and 12GB GDDR6 memory, it delivers accurate images and smooth operations. The desktop has a robust and solid frame with a stylish Raven Black casing, transparent side panel, and internal ARGB lighting. It also offers wireless Wi-Fi 6 connectivity, [Gigabit Ethernet](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-gigabit-ethernet/) port, and Bluetooth 5.0. Overall, the Lenovo Legion Tower 5 Gaming Desktop is a powerful and visually stunning [gaming PC](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-a-good-gaming-pc/). Key Features - Enhanced Legion Coldfront 2.0 cooling system - I9-11900K processor for impressive performance - Robust frame with ample ports and carry-handle - NVIDIA Ge Force RTX 3060 graphics with real-time ray tracing - Wireless Wi-Fi 6 2×2 802.11ax and Bluetooth 5.0 Specifications - Color: Raven Black - Dimension: 15.59Lx8.07Wx16.18H - Size: 128GB RAM | 2TB [NVMe SSD](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-a-nvme-ssd/)+ 1TB HDD Pros - Plug and play setup - High FPS and graphics customization - Quiet operation Cons - Potential issues with component compatibility The Lenovo Legion Tower 5 Gaming Desktop is a powerful gaming PC that offers impressive performance and stunning visuals. With its enhanced cooling system and high-end specs, it delivers a smooth and immersive gaming experience. The plug and play setup, along with the customizable lights and quiet operation, add to its appeal. However, there have been a few reports of potential issues with component compatibility, which may require troubleshooting or seeking assistance. Overall, if you’re in the market for a top-notch gaming desktop, the Legion Tower 5 is definitely worth considering. Overall Score: 9/10 The HP ENVY 34 Desktop is a powerful [all-in-one PC](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-an-all-in-one-pc/) that offers incredible performance and a stunning display. It features an Intel 12th gen processor with six cores and turbo boost up to 4.40GHz, making it perfect for demanding tasks. With 128GB of DDR5 RAM, this PC delivers ultra performance and ensures smooth multitasking. The [8TB SSD](https://robots.net/tech/8-amazing-8tb-ssd-for-2023/) provides a massive amount of storage and allows for fast boot times and data access. The 34-inch 5K display offers a brilliant visual experience with its high resolution and anti-reflection technology. The HP ENVY 34 also includes features like Win 11 PRO, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 graphics, Bang & Olufsen speakers, and a detachable 16MP camera. With its sleek design and powerful specifications, this PC is a great choice for professionals and tech enthusiasts. Key Features - Intel 12th gen processor with six cores and turbo boost up to 4.40GHz - 128GB of DDR5 RAM for ultra performance - 8TB SSD m.2 Drive for massive pure SSD storage - Huge 34-inch 5K WUHD display with anti-reflection technology - Win 11 PRO, NVIDIA Ge Force RTX 3060 graphics, and Bang & Olufsen speakers Specifications - Color: Turbo Silver - Dimension: 32.00Lx9.00Wx15.00H Pros - Powerful Intel 12th gen processor for smooth performance - Huge amount of RAM ensures seamless multitasking - Massive SSD storage for fast boot times and data access - Stunning 5K display with anti-reflection technology - Includes Win 11 PRO, NVIDIA graphics, and premium speakers Cons - High price point - Bulky and heavyweight design The HP ENVY 34 Desktop is an impressive all-in-one PC with top-of-the-line specifications. It delivers exceptional performance with its Intel 12th gen processor and 128GB of RAM, making it a powerhouse for demanding tasks. The 8TB SSD provides ample storage for all your files and ensures fast access times. The 34-inch 5K display offers a stunning visual experience with its high resolution and anti-reflection technology. The inclusion of Win 11 PRO, NVIDIA graphics, and Bang & Olufsen speakers further enhances the overall user experience. While the price may be steep and the design bulky, the HP ENVY 34 is a fantastic choice for professionals and tech enthusiasts who prioritize performance and visual quality. 128GB RAM Buyer's Guide Are you in need of high-performance RAM for your computer? Look no further than 128GB RAM! With a staggering amount of memory, it opens up a world of possibilities for multitasking, gaming, content creation, and more. To help you make an informed decision, we have prepared this comprehensive buyer's guide. Dive in and discover everything you need to know before purchasing 128GB RAM. Why Consider 128GB RAM? - Exceptional multitasking capabilities. - Suitable for extreme gaming and [virtual reality](https://robots.net/tech/what-does-the-virtual-reality-look-like/)experiences. - Ideal for professionals in fields like video editing, 3D modeling, and data analysis. - Enhanced performance in resource-intensive applications. - Future-proof your system for upcoming technologies and software. Key Factors to Consider - Compatibility: - Ensure your [motherboard](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-the-motherboard/)supports 128GB RAM capacity. - Check if your CPU and operating system can fully utilize 128GB RAM. - Verify the RAM type (DDR3, DDR4, etc.) supported by your system. - Assess your specific needs and workload demands. - Consider the nature of tasks you frequently perform. - Determine if 128GB RAM is required or if a lower capacity will suffice. - Higher clock speeds enhance data transfer rates. - Balanced speed ensures compatibility with other components. - Opt for faster speeds if your workload involves heavy multitasking and large file handling. - Lower latency results in faster data access. - Consider RAM with lower CAS latency for improved performance. - Understand how different timing parameters impact overall speed. - 128GB RAM modules are typically costly. - Evaluate the price-to-performance ratio. - Determine if the investment aligns with your specific needs and budget. - Opt for reputable brands known for producing reliable RAM. - Research customer reviews and ratings to gauge product quality. - Ensure the RAM has undergone rigorous testing and meets industry standards. - Check for heat spreaders to dissipate heat efficiently. - Heat spreaders enhance stability and lifespan. - Consider RAM with low-profile heat spreaders if you have space constraints. - Verify the warranty period offered by the manufacturer. - Research the company's reputation for customer support. - Ensure the warranty covers both hardware defects and compatibility issues. Frequently Asked Questions about 15 Best 128GB RAM For 2023 No, not all motherboards have the capacity to support 128GB RAM. You need to check the specifications of your motherboard to ensure it can handle this amount of memory. [RAM for gaming](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-the-best-ram-for-gaming/)? With 128GB RAM, you can experience smoother gameplay and reduced lag in demanding games. It allows for better multitasking, faster loading times, and improved overall gaming performance. [RAM speed](https://robots.net/tech/how-do-i-know-my-ram-speed/)up my computer? While 128GB RAM can improve performance in memory-intensive tasks and reduce bottlenecks, it may not significantly increase overall system speed for everyday computing tasks like web browsing or word processing. It is not recommended to mix different RAM speeds and sizes in a system with 128GB RAM. Doing so may result in compatibility issues, reduced performance, and potential instability. Yes, 128GB RAM is commonly used in servers that require high memory capacity for managing intensive workloads, virtualization, running multiple applications simultaneously, and handling large databases.

author: The Gazette editorial board
title: EDITORIAL: Highlight the resume with fast-food work
text:
It was a political stunt for the ages when former President Donald Trump donned a McDonald’s apron to work the fry machine and drive-thru window. Whether it helps reelect him remains to be seen, but let’s hope it does one thing for sure.
Let’s hope it symbolizes the dignity and importance of entry-level work.
Fast-food jobs become more important as inflation prices millions of Americans out of fast casual and sit-down restaurants. As the value of these jobs continues to rise, we see employment ads offering considerably more remuneration than the highest state minimum wages.
Today’s fast-food employees are increasingly rewarded with health insurance benefits, tuition assistance, flexible schedules and more. Some businesses offer hiring bonuses or “get paid the first day you work.”
Though an assortment of entry-level employers offer the moon and stars to young unskilled workers, McDonald’s has come to symbolize the first job. In 2015, the company began marketing itself for offering “America’s Best First Job.”
The 20th and 21st centuries provide countless examples of people who began their working years at McDonald’s and/or other fast-food establishments.
Jeff Bezos, founder and former CEO of Amazon, has amassed a fortune worth hundreds of billions. For him, it all began with flipping burgers and fulfilling orders at age 16.
“You can learn responsibility in any job if you take it seriously,” Bezos said, as quoted by Wired magazine. “You learn a lot as a teenager working at McDonald’s. It’s different from what you learn in school. Don’t underestimate the value of that!”
Taylor Morrison, CEO of the Taylor Morrison homebuilding company, began working at McDonald’s at age 15, climbing the ranks to become the company’s marketing manager for San Diego stores by the time she turned 20.
“Every 16-year-old should have to work at McDonald’s, because you really do learn how to work,” said Morrison, as quoted by Business Insider.
“You have to pull back the equipment and sweep behind. There are no shortcuts. You had to do it right because it was such a part of their brand. There were a lot of life lessons in that job.”
Paul Ryan, former speaker of the U.S. House, credits much of his success to fast-food experience.
“When I was flippin’ burgers at McDonald’s, when I was standing in front of that big Hobart machine washing dishes or waiting tables, I never thought of myself as stuck in some station in life,” Ryan said during a 2012 speech.
“I thought to myself, ‘I’m the American dream on a path and journey so that I can find happiness however I can find it myself.’”
Colorado’s unlikeliest member of Congress, Rep. Lauren Boebert, credits a McDonald’s job for keeping her off welfare — which she grew up on — and for showing her the freedom and fulfillment that comes with working for money.
Vice President Kamala Harris claims a McDonald’s work history, hoping it will help her become the first female president.
Some of the most successful people in the world tell war stories of entry-level work — usually at a fast-food chain — before they mention Ivy League degrees or promotions in the suit-and-tie world.
That’s because all work is important. All work elevates, strengthens and enlightens the person putting in the hours. Politics aside, it is good to see our country’s most accomplished leaders highlighting entry-level work as the foundation for success.
The Gazette Editorial Board

author: Robert Matheus Ferreira
title: Ênio se pronuncia sobre as suspeitas de manipulação em cartão amarelo que levou no Brasileirão 2025
text:
O atacante Ênio se pronunciou, pela primeira vez, após a divulgação das investigações sobre uma possível manipulação na partida do Juventude no Brasileirão 2025.
Durante a primeira rodada, uma suspeita foi levantada após a alta entrada de apostas em um cartão amarelo que o atacante levou, ainda no primeiro tempo da partida.
Suspeitas
- A partida entre Juventude e Vitória, na primeira rodada, entrou na mira das autoridades;
- Relatório da Ibia (Associação Internacional de Integridade nas Apostas Esportivas) cita 111 usuários na aposta, mas com muitas contas criadas antes do jogo;
- A CBF já recebeu o relatório sobre as suspeitas.
Ênio se pronunciou
O cartão que o atacante levou, ainda no primeiro tempo, veio por meio de reclamação contra o árbitro, Paulo Zanovelli. Ênio recebeu uma entrada, a falta não foi marcada e por isso, se exaltou contra a arbitragem, causando sua punição:
“Desde o início da minha trajetória no futebol, há cerca de 10 anos, sempre tive uma conduta absolutamente correta. Em minha vida pessoal, jamais me envolvi com qualquer indivíduo, grupo de pessoas ou coisas que o valha, que objetivasse algo ilícito, imoral ou desabonador; Trabalhei ao longo desses anos para voltar a um clube de Série A. Não desperdiçaria essa oportunidade. Além disso, não decepcionaria meus companheiros e o clube que abriu as portas para mim.
Diante da gravidade das acusações, já estão sendo tomadas as medidas judiciais cabíveis para comprovar minha total inocência e responsabilizar os que porventura estejam agindo de má-fé ou de forma precipitada. Por fim, deixo clara a minha total disponibilidade em contribuir com o que for necessário para que, no mais curto espaço de tempo, eu possa voltar a desempenhar o meu ofício".
Cartão amarelo na mira
A Ibia (Associação Internacional de Integridade nas Apostas Esportivas) entregou um relatório para a CBF onde cita 111 usuários e aproximadamente R$ 56,7 mil em apostas feitas.
Entretanto, a maioria das apostas foram feitas momentos antes do jogo e por contas recém-criadas e feitas somente para a aposta no cartão amarelo de Ênio. O movimento em massa ligou o alerta sobre uma possível manipulação.
Cinco bets diferentes foram citadas no documento da Ibia. Ênio levou o cartão aos 36 minutos do primeiro tempo, e com diversas apostas feitas de fora do Brasil. O jogador foi afastado do clube, que deu a justificativa de que o negociaria com o futebol estrangeiro. Entretanto, até agora, a venda não foi feita.
Confira os placares dos jogos pela 2ª rodada da Série A do Brasileirão 2025
Sábado (5):
- Corinthians 3 x 0 Vasco — 18h30 (de Brasília) — Neo Química Arena
- Ceará 2 x 0 Grêmio — 18h30 (de Brasília) — Castelão (CE)
- Botafogo 2 x 0 Juventude — 21h (de Brasília) — Nilton Santos
Domingo (6):
- Fluminense 2 x 1 Red Bull Bragantino — 16h (de Brasília) — Maracanã
- Atlético-MG 0 x 0 São Paulo — 16h (de Brasília) — Mineirão
- Mirassol 1 x 1 Fortaleza — 18h30 (de Brasília) — Maião
- Internacional 3 x 0 Cruzeiro — 18h30 (de Brasília) — Beira-Rio
- Vitória 1 x 2 Flamengo — 18h30 (de Brasília) — Barradão
- Sport 1 x 2 Palmeiras — 18h30 (de Brasília) — Ilha do Retiro
- Santos 2 x 2 Bahia — 20h30 (de Brasília) — Vila Belmiro
Quais times vão disputar a Série A do Campeonato Brasileiro em 2025?
- Atlético-MG
- Bahia
- Botafogo
- Ceará
- Corinthians
- Cruzeiro
- Flamengo
- Fluminense
- Fortaleza
- Juventude
- Grêmio
- Internacional
- Mirassol
- Palmeiras
- Red Bull Bragantino
- Santos
- São Paulo
- Sport
- Vasco
- Vitória
Times rebaixados para a Série B 2025:
Atlético-GO, Athletico-PR, Cuiabá e Criciúma caíram e irão disputar a Série B do Campeonato Brasileiro neste ano.
Times que subiram para Série A 2025:
Os times que subiram foram Santos (campeão da Série B), Mirassol, Sport e Ceará.
Como é disputada a Série A do Brasileirão?
Disputado no sistema de pontos corridos desde 2003, a elite do futebol brasileiro passou a ter 20 clubes competindo a partir de 2005. Desde então, o formato de disputa segue sendo utilizado.
Os 20 times jogam entre si uma vez por turno. No segundo turno, ou returno, as partidas são realizadas na mesma ordem do primeiro, invertendo o mando de campo. O vencedor soma três pontos por jogo, empate dá um ponto para cada time, e derrota não dá nenhum.
No Campeonato Brasileiro não há campeões por turnos. O troféu vai para quem somar mais pontos durante as 38 rodadas, podendo ser matematicamente definido com antecedência ou apenas no final, dando mais emoção aos torcedores na disputa!
Os seis primeiros clubes na tabela de classificação vão para a Libertadores 2025, sendo os quatro primeiros classificados direto para a fase de grupos, e o 5º e o 6º indo para a fase preliminar.
Os times que terminam do 7º ao 12º lugar vão para a Sul-Americana 2025, e os quatro últimos colocados são rebaixados à Série B.
O campeão brasileiro disputa, no início do ano seguinte, a Supercopa do Brasil contra o campeão da Copa do Brasil de 2024. As 380 partidas do Brasileirão contam com árbitro de vídeo (VAR), e a partir desta edição, os árbitros terão que comunicar, em áudio e vídeo, a decisão para todo o estádio.
Critérios de desempate:
Caso haja empate entre times na pontuação ao final da disputa, serão aplicados os seguintes critérios de desempate, em ordem:
- Número de vitórias;
- Saldo de gols;
- Gols pró (marcados);
- Confronto direto;
- Menor número de cartões vermelhos;
- Menor número de cartões amarelos;
- Sorteio.

author: Silvia Ferrer
title: La AEMET mantiene los avisos rojos: hoy y este fin de semana continuarán las lluvias fuertes en estas zonas
text:
La AEMET mantiene los avisos rojos: hoy y este fin de semana continuarán las lluvias fuertes en estas zonas
Antes de retirarse todavía los restos de la DANA dejarán precipitaciones fuertes y persistentes en puntos dónde lloverá sobre mojado, con tormentas localmente intensas y granizo.
Seguimos bajo la influencia de las bajas presiones que están dejando precipitaciones importantes especialmente en el cuadrante suroeste peninsular, pero también en el Levante, sur de Aragón, litoral de Cataluña y Baleares. Las tormentas son localmente fuertes y persistentes en la Andalucía occidental.
La AEMET mantendrá un aviso rojo hasta las 12 horas en el litoral de Huelva, allí hay que extremar las precauciones ante las lluvias que se están produciendo, de hasta 140 l/m2 en 12 horas. También lloverá en el Bajo Ebro y las Islas Baleares, así como en la vertiente sur del Sistema Central occidental, al suroeste de Castilla y León.
Frente a esto, en el Cantábrico, norte de Galicia, alto Ebro y norte de la meseta norte son muy poco probables, al igual que en Canarias. Sí se pueden dar en cualquier otro punto de la península Ibérica.
En la vertiente mediterránea oriental puede haber acumulados de entre 20 y 30 l/m2 por hora y 60 l/m2 en 12h. En Baleares se pueden registrar 50 l/m2 por hora y más de 120 l/m2 en menos de un día.
Las temperaturas máximas subirán hoy por el oeste peninsular, pero seguirán en descenso en el resto del país. Los vientos predominan del componente este, siendo algo más intensos en las zonas litorales y registrando intervalos fuertes en Cádiz y en el archipiélago balear.
Más precipitaciones fuertes este sábado
Aunque la inestabilidad irá a menos, se seguirán registrando precipitaciones durante el fin de semana. La jornada del sábado será una jornada de transición hacia la estabilidad, pero todavía con precipitaciones en el sur de Andalucía y levante, la zona del medio-bajo Ebro, este de Cataluña y Baleares.
Riesgo importante por acumulados de precipitación en torno a 40 l/m2 en una hora y 100 l/m2 en 12 horas en el litoral y prelitoral sur de Tarragona, algo inferiores en el litoral e interior de Castellón, y hasta primeras horas de la mañana en Mallorca y Menorca.
Los chubascos y tormentas podrán volver a ser localmente fuertes y persistentes en el sur de Cataluña, Baleares y los litorales de Castellón y Valencia, aunque pueden registrarse también en sus interiores. Por contra, en Canarias se podrán registrar algunas precipitaciones débiles, más dispersas y ocasionales en las islas de mayor relieve.
Seguirán subiendo las temperaturas máximas por el oeste peninsular, manteniéndose sin muchos cambios en el resto de la península. Y sin variaciones importantes de las mínimas por la noche.
Los vientos continuarán soplando en general débiles de componente este, y variables en Canarias. Aunque en los litorales volverán a soplar con intervalos fuertes y también el levante fuerte en el Estrecho.
¿Menos lluvia para el domingo?
El domingo seguiremos caminando hacia la estabilidad atmosférica pero con precipitaciones todavía en las comunidades mediterráneas, medio-bajo Ebro y los litorales catalanes. También en la zona del Estrecho y Baleares, así como en otras zonas del este peninsular.
En el Bajo Ebro habrá chubascos y tormentas localmente fuertes y persistentes hasta el mediodía, especialmente en el litoral norte de Castellón y sur de Tarragona. Además, continuaremos con posibilidad de precipitaciones débiles y dispersas en las islas montañosas de Canarias.
Las temperaturas se mantendrán sin grandes cambios para terminar la semana, con aumentos ligeros de las máximas. El viento de levante seguirá soplando con intervalos fuertes en la zona del Estrecho y el Mar de Alborán. Con viento del este reforzado en los litorales y Baleares un día más, y viento flojo de componente variable en el archipiélago canario.

author: RT en Español
title: Colombia alcanza la cifra más baja de deforestación en 23 años - RT
text:
Colombia alcanza la cifra más baja de deforestación en 23 años Publicado: 18 jul 2024 21:49 GMT El canciller de Colombia, Luis Gilberto Murillo, informó este jueves que su país ha logrado alcanzar "la cifra más baja de deforestación en 23 años", una noticia que calificó como "esperanzadora" y que responde a una reducción de 36 % en la deforestación durante 2023, al dejar de talar 44.261 hectáreas de bosques.
Murilló detalló, a través de la red social X, que la superficie no deforestada "equivale a casi tres veces el tamaño de Bucaramanga", un municipio que es capital del departamento de Santander, ubicado al noreste del país. "Este logro es el resultado del compromiso de todos los colombianos y de las políticas claras y decididas del Plan Nacional de Desarrollo 2022 – 2026", resaltó.
El ministro agregó que Colombia proyectaba reducir la deforestación en al menos 20 % respecto a 2021; sin embargo, ya esa cifra ha sido superada "con creces", dijo. "Este avance demuestra que, unidos, podemos salvaguardar nuestra riqueza natural y construir un futuro sostenible para las próximas generaciones", apuntó.
Comparto una noticia esperanzadora: Colombia logró la cifra más baja de deforestación en 23 años. El año anterior reducimos la deforestación en 36%, dejando de talar 44,261 hectáreas de bosque. Esta área equivale a casi tres veces el tamaño de Bucaramanga.Este logro es el… pic.twitter.com/vKZ1tOWYCR
— Luis Gilberto Murillo (@LuisGMurillo) July 18, 2024

author: VNExplorer
title: ¿Por qué es peligroso usar doble calcetín para protegerse del frío?
text:
Mujer se pone unos calcetines color gris
Usar doble calcetín como método para protegerse del frío puede parecer una solución tentadora en climas fríos, pero en realidad, esta práctica puede ser peligrosa para tu salud. Aquí te decimos por qué.
Esta práctica puede restringir la circulación sanguínea en los pies, especialmente si los calcetines son muy ajustados o si se usan zapatos que no tienen el espacio suficiente para acomodar la doble capa.
La reducción del flujo sanguíneo no solo disminuye la capacidad del cuerpo para mantener el calor en los pies, sino que también puede llevar a condiciones como el entumecimiento, las ampollas o incluso la congelación en climas extremadamente fríos.
Te recomendamos: Clima en México: seguirán las heladas en la noche; ingresa el frente frío 20
Por ello, es crucial elegir la ropa adecuada y evitar prácticas que puedan parecer beneficiosas a corto plazo, pero que, en realidad, podrían comprometer la salud y el bienestar.
¿Por qué no es bueno ponerse doble calcetín contra el frío? Según una publicación de la Secretaría de Gobernación, se aconseja no usar dos pares de medias o calcetines simultáneamente, ya que esto puede interrumpir la circulación en los pies.
Esta restricción circulatoria puede causar la formación de manchas distintas a los moretones en la zona afectada.
Síntomas como el hormigueo, picazón, hinchazón de pies y tobillos, cambio de color a tonos morados o azules, calambres y la aparición de varices rojizas son indicativos de mala circulación sanguínea.
Los calcetines normalmente tienen una banda elástica en su borde superior para evitar que se deslicen, ejerciendo presión alrededor del tobillo.
El uso de una doble capa aumenta esta presión, obstruyendo aún más el flujo sanguíneo.
Por lo tanto, se recomienda optar por calcetines de lana, que mantienen los pies cálidos sin causar exceso de sudoración, son libres de costuras y suficientemente ligeros para usar cómodamente.
¿Cómo protegerse de frío? Para protegerse eficientemente del frío, se pueden adoptar varias medidas. Una de ellas es la técnica de la cebolla, que consiste en vestirse con múltiples capas de ropa.
Es vital también proteger las áreas más expuestas al frío como el rostro, cabeza, manos y orejas. El uso de accesorios como guantes, bufandas, gorros y orejeras ayuda a mantener estas áreas calientes y prevenir la pérdida de calor corporal.
La alimentación juega un papel importante en el refuerzo del sistema inmunológico. Consumir frutas y verduras ricas en vitamina C, como naranjas, limones, guayabas, fresas, ciruelas, pimientos y brócoli, puede ayudar a fortalecer las defensas del cuerpo.
Finalmente, al pasar de un ambiente cálido a frío, es recomendable cubrirse boca y nariz para evitar el choque térmico y proteger las vías respiratorias.
Con estas prácticas, se puede minimizar el impacto del frente frío y mantener una buena salud durante la temporada invernal.

author: Rosa Lopez
title: RMP: Hace más de un año que el Congreso no para de atacar a la JNJ | Política | La República
text: RMP tras aprobación del predictamen en la Comisión de Constitución: "El Congreso no para de atacar a la JNJ" La periodista mencionó que el Congreso está decidido a modificar importantes secciones de la Constitución ante la pasividad de la población. [Rosa Maria Palacios](https://larepublica.pe/tag/rosa-maria-palacios), a través del programa Sin Guion, se pronunció sobre el predictamen aprobado en la Comisión de Constitución que busca eliminar a la Junta Nacional de Justicia (JNJ) y crear la Escuela Nacional de la Magistratura. La periodista mencionó que el Congreso está decidido a modificar importantes secciones de la Constitución ante la pasividad de la población, pues el dictamen preparado por la exfiscal [Gladys Echaiz](https://larepublica.pe/tag/gladys-echaiz) , aprobado con 13 votos a favor, 5 en contra y 5 abstenciones, tiene diseñado todo un sistema para que los miembros del próximo reemplazo de la JNJ pasen por otro esquema que no sea el aprobado a través de un referéndum en diciembre de 2018. PUEDES VER: [JNJ tras aprobación de predictamen en Constitución: “Afecta a todo el sistema de justicia”] Bajo ese contexto, Palacios recuerda que el origen de la Junta Nacional de Justicia se dio cuando, en julio del mismo año, se filtró un audio donde se negociaban los puestos de fiscales y jefes del Consejo Nacional de la Magistratura, hecho que desencadenó la destitución de los miembros de aquel entonces. Posteriormente, el expresidente [Vizcarra ](https://larepublica.pe/tag/martin-vizcarra) presentó un proyecto de reforma constitucional que culminó en un referéndum, donde el 86% de los peruanos aprobaron la modificación del sistema de justicia, entre otros temas, como el fin de la reelección congresal. Palacios menciona que "hace más de un año que el Congreso no para de atacar a la Junta Nacional" desde que destituyó a todos sus miembros por causas graves el año pasado e inhabilitó por 10 años a dos de ellos. Además, si la [Comisión de Constitución](https://larepublica.pe/tag/comision-de-constitucion) también aprobó el dictamen para que puedan elegir de manera directa a los jefes de la ONPE y la RENIEC, lo que el Pleno está buscando sería apoderarse en su totalidad del sistema electoral y de justicia. RMP también se pronunció sobre la agenda del viaje a China de Boluarte y la aprobación de la Comisión de Relaciones Exteriores Palacios cuestionó la agenda del viaje de la presidenta Boluarte a China, que fue autorizado en el Pleno del Congreso el día de ayer con 71 votos a favor, 41 en contra y 6 abstenciones. Si bien se presenta como una visita de Estado, 3 de los 7 días serán destinados a reuniones con empresarios chinos y constructoras. Entre ellos, se incluyen representantes de la empresa de tecnología Huawei, la misma que financia algunos de los viajes de los congresistas. Asimismo, Rosa María Palacios también se pronunció sobre la aprobación del dictamen del proyecto de ley que busca regular y sancionar a las Organizaciones No Gubernamentales (ONG) que reciben financiamiento del exterior, bajo el pretexto de contribuir con la supervisión y correcto uso de recursos del exterior. Según la periodista, esta aprobación por parte de la Comisión de Relaciones Exteriores del [Congreso](https://larepublica.pe/tag/congreso-del-peru) es una violación a la Constitución y pondría en riesgo el financiamiento de organizaciones de prensa, defensoras de derechos humanos y las que defienden la salud sexual y reproductiva en mujeres. Organizaciones que, para Palacios, serían 'enemigas' de los congresistas.
